hero.description: Complete solution for your business online. I'll do everything: choose the design, create the website, set up SEO and advertising.

about.introduction: Hello! My name is Leonid Pampukha. I create ready-to-use websites for small businesses so you can focus on your core business.
about.approach: My approach - doing everything for you
about.approachDescription: You don't waste time searching for designs or dealing with technical issues. I study your business, select the perfect design, develop the website, and set up promotion - everything turnkey.
about.cleanCodeDescription: I handle all technical matters so you don't have to
about.responsiveDescription: Your website will look perfect on all devices without additional setup
about.modernDescription: I'll select a stylish design that you and your customers will love
about.clientFocusedDescription: From design to advertising - a complete package of services without your intervention

portfolio.description: View examples of my work. Each project is designed with the individual needs of the client and modern web design trends in mind.

project1.title: Online store
project1.description: Modern online store with product catalog, shopping cart, and payment.

project2.title: Corporate website
project2.description: Professional website for company representation on the Internet.

project3.title: Product landing page
project3.description: Sales page for presenting a product or service.

services.description: Get a ready-to-use website without any hassle. I take care of all stages: from design selection to advertising setup.

service1.title: Ready-made website
service1.description: Fully functional website for your business without your involvement in technical matters.

service2.title: Sales pages
service2.description: Effective pages for presenting your products or services that increase conversion.

service3.title: Advertising setup
service3.description: Launch and optimization of your website advertising on Facebook/Instagram and Google.

service4.title: Existing websites update
service4.description: Transforming your old website into a modern and effective sales tool.

service5.title: SEO optimization
service5.description: Complete website setup for better visibility in search engines.

service6.title: Technical optimization
service6.description: Ensuring fast website loading for better user experience.

services.benefit1: You get a ready product without hassle
services.benefit2: No need to understand technical details
services.benefit3: Comprehensive solution: from design to advertising
services.benefit4: Fixed price with no hidden payments

contact.description: Ready to discuss your project? Fill out the form below or contact me in any way convenient for you.

footer.description: Comprehensive solutions for your business online. I do everything: from design to advertising. You just have to receive clients.
